item.title: Jake Paul eases to victory by decision over Mike Tyson
item.description: Jake Paul won the highly anticipated boxing match on Netflix by unanimous decision 80-72, 79-73, 79-73 as Paul landed 78 punches to Mike Tyson's 18.
